help-file.title: MAGICIAN
help-file.content: - Skill: Expeditious retreat: improved retreat in any direction, even when tanking - Spell (10th): obscuring mist: when cast, the room the illusionist is in becomes no-scan - Spell (11th): supress sound: when cast, the illusionist silences his own group, allowing them to not make any noise when walking - Innate: Improved Flee: when the illusionist flees, it appears that he flees in several directions
